info.title: Transaction Data for Group Reporting - Read
info.description: This service selects transaction data that is included in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting, such as reported financial data or consolidated financial data. With this service you can retrieve consolidated data including intercompany elimination and consolidation entries.

x-sap-shortText: This synchronous inbound service provides transaction data in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting

values.text: Finance - Cloud Consolidation Data Collection Integration(SAP_COM_0241)
Finance - Cloud Consolidation Transaction Data for Group Reporting Integration(SAP_COM_0348)
[Group Reporting - Data from SAP Group Reporting Data Collection(287)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/287 " Link To BP ")
[Group Reporting - Data from External Systems(2U6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2U6 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Group Reporting: Journal Entry Item (FINCS_JOURNAL_ENTRY_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
